verses.name: Jeremiah 28:8
verses.text: The prophets that have been before me and before thee of old prophesied both against many countries, and against great kingdoms, of war, and of evil, and of pestilence.

verses.name: Jeremiah 28:9
verses.text: The prophet which prophesieth of peace, when the word of the prophet shall come to pass, then shall the prophet be known, that the Lord hath truly sent him.

verses.name: Jeremiah 28:10
verses.text: Then Hananiah the prophet took the yoke from off the prophet Jeremiah’s neck, and brake it.
